sidebar_position: 1

# Lifecycle APIs
During the build, plugins are loaded in parallel to fetch their own contents and render them to routes. Plugins may also configure webpack or post-process the generated files.

translations.zh-hant: 在建置過程中，插件會平行載入以獲取各自的內容並將其渲染為路由。插件還可以配置 webpack 或對生成的文件進行後處理。

segments.source_content: ## `async loadContent()` {#loadContent}
Plugins should use this lifecycle to fetch from data sources (filesystem, remote API, headless CMS, etc.) or do some server processing. The return value is the content it needs.

translations.zh-hant: 插件應使用此生命週期從數據源（文件系統、遠程 API、無頭 CMS 等）獲取數據或進行一些伺服器端處理。返回值是插件所需的內容。

segments.source_content: For example, this plugin below returns a random integer between 1 and 10 as content.

translations.zh-hant: 例如，下面的插件返回一個 1 到 10 之間的隨機整數作為內容。

segments.source_content: ## `async contentLoaded({content, actions})` {#contentLoaded}
The data that was loaded in `loadContent` will be consumed in `contentLoaded`. It can be rendered to routes, registered as global data, etc.

translations.zh-hant: 在 `contentLoaded` 中會使用 `loadContent` 載入的數據。這些數據可以被渲染為路由、註冊為全局數據等。

segments.source_content: ### `content` {#content}
`contentLoaded` will be called _after_ `loadContent` is done. The return value of `loadContent()` will be passed to `contentLoaded` as `content`.

translations.zh-hant: `contentLoaded` 會在 `loadContent` 完成後被調用。`loadContent()` 的返回值將作為 `content` 傳遞給 `contentLoaded`。

segments.source_content: ### `actions` {#actions}
`actions` contain three functions:
#### `addRoute(config: RouteConfig): void` {#addRoute}
Create a route to add to the website.

translations.zh-hant: 創建一個路由並添加到網站中。

segments.source_content: #### `createData(name: string, data: any): Promise<string>` {#createData}

A declarative callback to create static data (generally JSON or string) which can later be provided to your routes as props. Takes the file name and data to be stored, and returns the actual data file's path.

translations.zh-hant: 一個宣告式回調，用於創建靜態數據（通常是 JSON 或字符串），這些數據稍後可以作為 props 提供給你的路由。接收文件名和要存儲的數據，並返回實際數據文件的路徑。

segments.source_content: For example, this plugin below creates a `/friends` page which displays `Your friends are: Yangshun, Sebastien`:

translations.zh-hant: 例如，下面的插件創建了一個 `/friends` 頁面，顯示 `你的朋友是：Yangshun, Sebastien`：

segments.source_content: #### `setGlobalData(data: any): void` {#setGlobalData}
This function permits one to create some global plugin data that can be read from any page, including the pages created by other plugins, and your theme layout.

translations.zh-hant: 此函數允許創建一些全局插件數據，這些數據可以從任何頁面讀取，包括其他插件創建的頁面和你的主題佈局。

segments.source_content: This data becomes accessible to your client-side/theme code through the [`useGlobalData`](../../docusaurus-core.mdx#useGlobalData) and [`usePluginData`](../../docusaurus-core.mdx#usePluginData) hooks.

translations.zh-hant: 這些數據可以通過 [`useGlobalData`](../../docusaurus-core.mdx#useGlobalData) 和 [`usePluginData`](../../docusaurus-core.mdx#usePluginData) 鉤子在客戶端/主題代碼中訪問。

segments.source_content:
:::warning

Global data is... global: its size affects the loading time of all pages of your site, so try to keep it small. Prefer `createData` and page-specific data whenever possible.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::warning

全局數據是...全局的：其大小會影響網站所有頁面的加載時間，因此請盡量保持其體積小巧。盡可能優先使用 `createData` 和頁面特定數據。

:::

segments.source_content: For example, this plugin below creates a `/friends` page which displays `Your friends are: Yangshun, Sebastien`:

translations.zh-hant: 例如，下面的插件創建了一個 `/friends` 頁面，顯示 `你的朋友是：Yangshun, Sebastien`：

segments.source_content: ## `configureWebpack(config, isServer, utils, content)` {#configureWebpack}

Modifies the internal webpack config. If the return value is a JavaScript object, it will be merged into the final config using [`webpack-merge`](https://github.com/survivejs/webpack-merge). If it is a function, it will be called and receive `config` as the first argument and an `isServer` flag as the second argument.

translations.zh-hant: 修改內部 webpack 配置。如果返回值是一個 JavaScript 對象，它將使用 [`webpack-merge`](https://github.com/survivejs/webpack-merge) 合併到最終配置中。如果是一個函數，它將被調用並接收 `config` 作為第一個參數和 `isServer` 標誌作為第二個參數。

segments.source_content:
:::warning

The API of `configureWebpack` will be modified in the future to accept an object (`configureWebpack({config, isServer, utils, content})`)

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::warning

`configureWebpack` 的 API 將來會修改為接收一個對象 (`configureWebpack({config, isServer, utils, content})`)

:::

segments.source_content: ### `config` {#config}
`configureWebpack` is called with `config` generated according to client/server build. You may treat this as the base config to be merged with.

translations.zh-hant: `configureWebpack` 被調用時會傳入根據客戶端/伺服器端建置生成的 `config`。你可以將其視為要合併的基礎配置。

segments.source_content: ### `isServer` {#isServer}
`configureWebpack` will be called both in server build and in client build. The server build receives `true` and the client build receives `false` as `isServer`.

translations.zh-hant: `configureWebpack` 會在伺服器建置和客戶端建置時被呼叫。伺服器建置會收到 `true`，而客戶端建置會收到 `false` 作為 `isServer` 參數。

segments.source_content: ### `utils` {#utils}
`configureWebpack` also receives an util object:

translations.zh-hant: `configureWebpack` 還會收到一個工具物件：

segments.source_content:
- `getStyleLoaders(isServer: boolean, cssOptions: {[key: string]: any}): Loader[]`
- `getJSLoader(isServer: boolean, cacheOptions?: {}): Loader | null`

translations.zh-hant:
- `getStyleLoaders(isServer: boolean, cssOptions: {[key: string]: any}): Loader[]`
- `getJSLoader(isServer: boolean, cacheOptions?: {}): Loader | null`

segments.source_content: You may use them to return your webpack configuration conditionally.

translations.zh-hant: 你可以使用它們來有條件地回傳你的 webpack 配置。

segments.source_content: For example, this plugin below modify the webpack config to transpile `.foo` files.

translations.zh-hant: 例如，下面的插件修改了 webpack 配置以轉譯 `.foo` 檔案。

segments.source_content: ### `content` {#content-1}
`configureWebpack` will be called both with the content loaded by the plugin.

translations.zh-hant: `configureWebpack` 會與插件載入的內容一起被呼叫。

segments.source_content: ### Merge strategy {#merge-strategy}
We merge the Webpack configuration parts of plugins into the global Webpack config using [webpack-merge](https://github.com/survivejs/webpack-merge).

translations.zh-hant: 我們使用 [webpack-merge](https://github.com/survivejs/webpack-merge) 將插件的 Webpack 配置部分合併到全域 Webpack 配置中。

segments.source_content: It is possible to specify the merge strategy. For example, if you want a webpack rule to be prepended instead of appended:

translations.zh-hant: 可以指定合併策略。例如，如果你希望 webpack 規則被前置而不是後置：

segments.source_content: Read the [webpack-merge strategy doc](https://github.com/survivejs/webpack-merge#merging-with-strategies) for more details.
### Configuring dev server {#configuring-dev-server}
The dev server can be configured through returning a `devServer` field.

translations.zh-hant: 可以通過回傳一個 `devServer` 欄位來配置開發伺服器。

segments.source_content: ## `configurePostCss(options)` {#configurePostCss}
Modifies [`postcssOptions` of `postcss-loader`](https://webpack.js.org/loaders/postcss-loader/#postcssoptions) during the generation of the client bundle.

translations.zh-hant: 在生成客戶端套件時修改 [`postcss-loader` 的 `postcssOptions`](https://webpack.js.org/loaders/postcss-loader/#postcssoptions)。

segments.source_content: Should return the mutated `postcssOptions`.
By default, `postcssOptions` looks like this:

translations.zh-hant: 預設情況下，`postcssOptions` 看起來像這樣：

segments.source_content: Example:
## `postBuild(props)` {#postBuild}
Called when a (production) build finishes.

translations.zh-hant: 在（生產）建置完成時呼叫。

segments.source_content: Example:
## `injectHtmlTags({content})` {#injectHtmlTags}
Inject head and/or body HTML tags to Docusaurus generated HTML.

translations.zh-hant: 向 Docusaurus 生成的 HTML 注入 head 和/或 body HTML 標籤。

segments.source_content: `injectHtmlTags` will be called both with the content loaded by the plugin.

translations.zh-hant: `injectHtmlTags` 會與插件載入的內容一起被呼叫。

segments.source_content: Example:
Tags will be added as follows:

translations.zh-hant: 標籤將按以下方式添加：

segments.source_content:
- `headTags` will be inserted before the closing `</head>` tag after scripts added by config.
- `preBodyTags` will be inserted after the opening `<body>` tag before any child elements.
- `postBodyTags` will be inserted before the closing `</body>` tag after all child elements.

translations.zh-hant:
- `headTags` 會在 `</head>` 標籤關閉前插入，位於配置添加的腳本之後。
- `preBodyTags` 會在 `<body>` 標籤開啟後插入，位於任何子元素之前。
- `postBodyTags` 會在 `</body>` 標籤關閉前插入，位於所有子元素之後。

segments.source_content: ## `getClientModules()` {#getClientModules}
Returns an array of paths to the [client modules](../../advanced/client.mdx#client-modules) that are to be imported into the client bundle.

translations.zh-hant: 回傳要導入客戶端套件的[客戶端模組](../../advanced/client.mdx#client-modules)路徑陣列。

segments.source_content: As an example, to make your theme load a `customCss` or `customJs` file path from `options` passed in by the user:

translations.zh-hant: 例如，要讓你的主題載入用戶傳入的 `options` 中的 `customCss` 或 `customJs` 檔案路徑：
